attributes.action: Call a General Election by the end of 2017. The Tories lied to get into power.
attributes.background: Austerity measures are harming all but the wealthiest in society. Hard working people, as well as the sick and disabled, teachers, police, junior doctors and our treasured NHS are all at risk. There will now be more people out of work, with our Steel industry closed as contracts are given to China.
